shortdesc.ph: 接口类用于 SDK 向 app 发送事件通知，app 通过继承该接口类的方法获取 SDK 的事件通知。

section.p: All methods in this interface have default (empty) implementation. You can choose to inherit events related to your app scenario. In the callback method, the app should not do time-consuming or call potentially blocking APIs (such as sendMessage), otherwise it may affect the operation of the SDK.
